publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2818# Colin Campbell: Regeneration-That the Parliament recognises that a lack of appropriate jobs is a major problem in Scotland; notes that a main cause is the decline of heavy industry in the past three decades; considers that all local authorities, MSPs and key agencies should work together to implement a regeneration programme, and believes that the Scottish Executive should provide resources for its speedy completion. Supported by: Andrew Wilson*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Christine Grahame*, Linda Fabiani*, Richard Lochhead*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Mr Duncan Hamilton*, Fiona McLeod*, Michael Russell*
S1M-2818# Regeneration (lodged on 1 March 2002) Irene McGugan*, Stewart Stevenson*, Shona Robison*
S1M-2818# Regeneration (lodged on 1 March 2002) Michael Matheson*
S1M-2818# Regeneration (lodged on 1 March 2002) Tommy Sheridan*
